message: I haven't read this, but I'm seeing increasing amount of references to it.  Will need to read it soon.
One of the guys who wrote PNUTS used to linger in #cassandra. I should ask my boss about it, he's a former Yahoo and worked on the Hadoop project internally.

I'm actually implementing a system designed along these principles for internal cross-datacenter storage on top of Redis at $ORK right now. Will let you guys know how it goes and maybe open source it if I can.
